title: Black Christmas
description: When the sisters of Pi Kappa Sig begin clearing out for Christmas break, three friends decide to stay behind, only to be terrorized by obscene phone calls that chill them to the bone and lead them to suspect someone dangerous may be stalking them.Based on the classic, chilling film by Bob Clark, if this book doesn't make your skin crawl, it's on TOO TIGHT!
author: Lee Hays
